unit: Unit 9 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
title: Paper Airplanes
question_text:
A statistics student asks $32$ other students to build paper airplanes without specific instructions as to size. He asks them to record both the length of the planes and the length of the flights. He wanted to create a confidence interval for the slope of the regression equation for these variables.
What would the value of the degrees of freedom be to obtain the value of $t^{*}$?
